item.title: Zig as a Drop in C Replacement
item.description: A while back I wrote a small neofetch-like program in Zig as a way to learn the language. I always knew Zig could interoperate with C, as I had earlier written a yara rules parser using treesitter and Zig. Now I wanted to test my neofetch-like program in various environments, and one of those was st. St is a simple terminal emulator, part of the suckless tools. It is written in C, minimalistic and I generally liked using it.
